special_text:
[i](Activate once each turn as a sorcery. When you're done dreaming, sacrifice this.)[/i]
When this Dream enters, create two 2/1 white Warrior creature tokens with “This creature can't block.”
{R}: Level 2
You may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards.
{2}{R}: Level 3
An opponent may have this Dream deal 4 damage to them. If they don't, exile a red card you own from outside the game. Until end of your next turn, you may play that card.
